title: Devasena Antique Finish Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
features: This exquisite Haaram features intricate filigree work and a captivating central pendant. The pendant showcases Goddess Lakshmi delicately crafted in gold and surrounded by shimmering diamonds. The elegant diamond-studded border and the delicate golden bead drops add a touch of traditional charm. The necklace chain features a teardrop shape adorned with diamonds. The antique finish enhances the timeless appeal, giving it a heritage feel.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Also suitable for high-end traditional parties.
description: This Devasena Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending tradition with modern elegance. The antique finish and the intricate Lakshmi pendant invoke blessings and prosperity. The high-quality diamonds and emerald ensure lasting brilliance and value. A timeless investment for generations to cherish.
